website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering for pet owners who need a digestive supplement with appealing flavor. If side effects occur, they are likely to ease up in most pets when taken on a regular basis.
pros: Formulated especially for pets with sensitive stomachs
Contains enzymes that improve digestion and promote the growth of good bacteria in the digestive system
Easy to administer, as most dogs and cats love the flavor
Available in powder for dogs and cats and tasty chews for dogs
cons: May cause gas in some pets that is likely to improve with repeated use
Some owners report that their pets developed diarrhea after taking it

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend these. I rescued my dog at 10 weeks old she was in very poor healthy, it took several trips to the vet and a lot of medications to get her back to health. She's always had a very sensitive stomach, very picky with food. I bought these a few weeks ago and I've noticed a huge change, she no longer eats tons of grass, no more vomiting, no more stool issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Positives and Negatives
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product to my dogs for a month, and I'm iffy on the results. Positive: it really did stop my dogs from eating a lot of grass, and it helped one of my dogs constantly gurgling stomach get much quieter. Negative: both dogs experienced softer, greener and messier stool. I think this is a good product, but I need to try a different brand
customer_reviews.author: KS.Bainbridge

customer_reviews.title: NaturVet Probiotics
customer_reviews.text: We have used these for almost a week now and the stinky dog farts have decreased dramatically. I'm surprised we are getting results this quickly. A very inexpensive remedy to fix a stinky dog! It is important to have dog food that has a meat as a first ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: financialambster

customer_reviews.title: Our frenchie loves these!
customer_reviews.text: We have a French bulldog and they are notorious for having sensitive stomachs. We give one of these to our girl every night with dinner. She also gets the NaturVet multivitamin and allergy supplement as well. She loves all of them and thinks they’re treats! I recommend these products to everyone that has a dog!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Cranston

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product zero stars, I would. I received it yesterday and gave one to my dog with his evening meal. I gave him one this morning with his food, and again with his evening meal as per label instructions. He now has diarrhea and EXTREMELY smelly flatulence. If it wasn’t so much trouble to return it, I would. Instead, I’m just going to have to throw away $15 because I will NOT be giving him any more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Walker

customer_reviews.title: Watch for allergies
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to be allergic to these. Cost her a month of itching and bumps on her skin while we tried to figure out what was wrong and had to give her steroids to control the effects. This may work for your dog, but it sure didn’t work for mine.
customer_reviews.author: aliastic

customer_reviews.title: Restored my dog's vitality!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old rescue miniature poodle always had problems with loose stool. He used to be a voracious eater but about six months ago began rejecting food, no matter which brand I tried, and he lost noticeable weight. Then he became rather lethargic and even somewhat disorientated, no doubt due to lack of nutrition. I am SO glad I discovered NaturVet Advanced Probiotics & Enzymes - within a few days he was eating fine again, had firmer stools, and most importantly his energy soared and he is now chipper as a puppy again! Thank you, Naturvet!
customer_reviews.author: Peregrine

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how my dog would make it without this.
customer_reviews.text: My pup had a bad reaction to his immunizations. This caused severe diarrhea that lasted over a year and a half and required numerous visits to the vet, hospitalizations, and many medications that just did not help him. A friend suggested I try these. Withing 2 weeks of starting these my poor pup was finally not on the run every half our or so! He finally started gaining weight. He has had no problems unless we stop using this. I am so thankful. This product has been a life saver in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: RN2travel2

customer_reviews.title: Helped my guy's breath a whole lot
customer_reviews.text: After my 8 year old dachshund got his teeth cleaned, it didn't take long for his breath to get absolutely disgusting again. Seriously bad. My mother thought it was coming from inside the dog, whereas I thought the vet just did a bad job at the cleaning. On a colleague's suggestion, I wanted to try probiotics. Within two days his breath greatly improved. He has ordinary dog breath now which is huge progress for my little stinker. I chose this brand because a small family owned let store recommended their hemp treats once. I'm careful about what a feed my dog and am skeptical of buying online, but I trust NaturVet
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: its that poop agian!!!~ Adam sandler
customer_reviews.text: I guess these are a good probiotic, the farts have definitely reduced. I give these to my dog sparingly, after the 1st 3 days of 1 treat per day- He left us #2's on the floor. He has never defecated in the house before. So they work as a probiotic. but I wouldn't overdo them.... I now give them to my pup once a week or once every few days max. this way no accidents, and less gass.
customer_reviews.author: crazykiska06

customer_reviews.title: Dogs enjoy them.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Both doggos enjoy them, no explosive diarrhea. Poops look good. We'll see long-term... UPDATE 1 year later: This family is committed to these probiotic chews. Our dog has colitis, and these work brilliantly, his poop looks amazing (dog owners, you know). Discontinued them with the other doggo bc vet said he was young and didn't need them.
customer_reviews.author: yekkersrow

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: My finicky Boston Terrier takes these happily as treats after her meals. Since we started her on them a few days ago, her poops have been firmer. She's had soft poop for awhile now, as a result of medications she takes for a heart condition, so these have really helped with the ease of scooping! Highly recommended for dogs with sensitive GI tracts.

He used to have at least one day a week that he couldn’t eat , or he would eat and then up his food. I’ve been giving his NatureVeg probiotics for over a year now and he rarely has stomach distress any more . He also is much less gassy which is a pleasure for everyone. To him these are treats and he loves them.

Not really sure exactly how they help her stomach but they have made a world of difference and it is much better then get visits and medication.

My foster was returned two months ago after 14 months of being adopted and I immediately ordered more. I will always recommend this to anyone who has a dog with any kind of GI issue.

Prompt delivery to my front door.

Sorry I can't comment on the flavor. The dog obviously isn't fussy. As for value for money, I still buy it, meaning it's worth it to me; but that's a subjective judgement.

customer_reviews.title: S O F T  chews ????
customer_reviews.text: I guess it depends on what your definition of SOFT chews are. I switched brands from another soft chew that were really soft and seemed fresh. These are close to dried beef that I am letting soak in water or broth before giving them to my dogs. I am hoping this is just a description issue and not a quality issue of stale chews - I have no way to tell but they are NOT soft and if you tried to break them, you would need a knife.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Chihuahua

customer_reviews.title: A miracle for dogs with sensitive stomachs!
customer_reviews.text: I waited until till my container was almost gone to leave a review, but the results from this product were almost immediate. I was truly skeptical, I have two schnauzers and the breed is prone to dry skin, sensitive stomachs, and pancreatitis. My oldest is plagued with all 3 and he is only 4, this product seemed to help with all of that! He rarely ate before the probiotics because his food wasn't moving through his system properly, now he eats twice a day and poops regularly. This is something countless vet visits never achieved. This is definitely a holy grail product for my boys, they even think it is a treat!

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My dog has cancer. Due to his cancer & medication that he has to take, he has developed problems with his digestion, including gas. This production has been very helpful! His discomfort & gas has significantly decreased. I recommend you try this, if your dog is having gastrointestinal problems.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Best product for my older dog with digestive issues!
customer_reviews.text: I tried others but this works exceptionally well for my 14-year-old dog with digestive issues. Keeps him regular and big improvement in his stool. Highly recommend!

product_meta.title: NaturVet – Advanced Probiotics & Enzymes - Plus Vet Strength PB6 Probiotic – Supports and Balances Pets with Sensitive Stomachs & Digestive Issues – for Dogs & Cats
feature_bullets: Advanced Probiotics & Enzymes was specifically developed to support and balance the total GI environment.
PB6 Probiotic technology enables beneficial bacteria to travel through the complete GI tract for optimal stomach and intestinal balance.
Great for pets with sensitive stomachs and digestive issues. For use in dogs over the age of 6 weeks.
Tasty soft chews that taste like a treat, packaged with a re-sealable jar to ensure freshness.
Wheat Free, NASC, cGMP Compliant, Manufactured in the USA
